verses.name: Genesis 42:23
verses.text: And they knew not that Joseph understood them; for he spake unto them by an interpreter.

verses.name: Genesis 42:24
verses.text: And he turned himself about from them, and wept; and returned to them again, and communed with them, and took from them Simeon, and bound him before their eyes.

verses.name: Genesis 42:25
verses.text: Then Joseph commanded to fill their sacks with corn, and to restore every man’s money into his sack, and to give them provision for the way: and thus did he unto them.

verses.name: Genesis 42:26
verses.text: And they laded their asses with the corn, and departed thence.
